LocaleResource.Value: پشتیبانی از Full-Text با موفقیت فعال شد

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.Configuration.Settings.GeneralCommon.FullTextSettings.NoiseWords
LocaleResource.Value: To prevent a full-text index from becoming bloated, Microsoft SQL Server has a mechanism that discards commonly occurring words that do not help the search. These words are called noise words, or stop words. Noise words are listed in the locale specific noise word files. For example, in the English locale, words such as "a," "and," "is," and "the" are in the English noise word file and are left out of the full-text index since they are empirically known to be useless to a search. Please contact your SQL Server administrator to get more information about it.

LocaleResource.Name: eucookielaw.description
LocaleResource.Value: در 26 می سال 2011، قوانین استفاده از کوکی ها در وبسایت ها تغییرکرد. این سایت از کوکی ها استفاده می کند. یک یا بشتر از یک مورد از کوکی ها که استفاده می کنیم، برای بخش های مختلف این وبسایت به منظور انجام عملیات ضروری است و در حال حاضر مقداردهی شده است. شما می توانید همه ی کوکی های این سایت را حذف و بلاک کنید ولی آنگاه بخش هایی از سایت کار نخواهند کرد. برای فهمیدن مطالب بیشتری راجع به کوکی هایی که در این سایت استفاده شده اند و این که چطور کوکی ها را حذف کنید، سیاست حفظ حریم شخصی مربوط به ما را ببینید.

LocaleResource.Name: eucookielaw.description2

LocaleResource.Name: plugins.payments.mellat.fields.redirectiontip
LocaleResource.Value:
پس از مرحله "تایید سفارش" و کلیک بر دکمه تایید، جهت پرداخت به درگاه بانک ملت منتقل خواهید شد.

توجه فرمایید که پس از عملیات موفق در درگاه بانک، در هنگام بازگشت به سایت زودبوک، به هیچ عنوان از کلید Back یا Refresh مرورگر خود استفاده نفرمایید و تا بارگزاری کامل سایت و مشاهده کد پیگیری، شکیبا باشید.

در صورتی که به هر علتی به سایت زودبوک بازنگشتید ، یا پیغام تراکنش ناموفق را دریافت نمودید، وجهی به حساب زودبوک واریز نشده، و در صورت کسر از حساب شما توسط بانک، حداکثر طی 30 دقیقه وجه به حسابتان توسط بانک عودت داده می شود

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Conditions.Admin.Condition.Active.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the condition is active.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Conditions.Admin.Condition.DefaultConditionValue.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If the product does not match any condition groups, then this determines whether the item will be shown on the product. Almost always select "Fail" unless you want to show on every product.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Conditions.Admin.Condition.Description
LocaleResource.Value:
With conditions you can filter the products for which this item will be shown.
The conditions consist of Condition Groups.
The Default State is also considered as a condition group.
A Condition Group consists of one or many Condition Statements (rules).
The dependancy between the Condition Groups is OR and between the Condition Statements is AND. This means that if all of the Condition Statements in one Condition Group are true for a product, the item will be displayed over that product.
To add a Condition Group you need to click on the Add Condition Group button. To delete a Condition Group you need to click on the Delete button. To add a Condition Statement to the Condition Group, you need to click on the Add new record button.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.ProductRibbons.Admin.Settings.ProductRibbon.CategoryPageRibbon.CategoryPageRibbonSettings
LocaleResource.Value:
Specify the settings for the ribbon shown on the small (thumbnail) product picture.
The small (thumbnail) product pictures are used for the products (product boxes) on the followings:
catalog and manufacturer pages, related products, also purchased products, home page products, recently viewed products etc.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.ProductRibbons.Admin.Settings.ProductRibbon.Condition.Description
LocaleResource.Value:
With conditions you can filter the products for which this ribbon will be shown.
The conditions consist of Condition Groups.
The Default State is also considered as a condition group.
A Condition Group consists of one or many Condition Statements (rules).
The dependancy between the Condition Groups is OR and between the Condition Statements is AND. This means that if all of the Condition Statements in one Condition Group are true for a product, the ribbon will be displayed over that product.
To add a Condition Group you need to click on the Add Condition Group button. To delete a Condition Group you need to click on the Delete button. To add a Condition Statement to the Condition Group, you need to click on the Add new record button.

The ribbon image html element is nested inside the ribbon element.

LocaleResource.Value:

Leave empty if you use a ribbon picture that contains text.
You can use the Available Product Tokens here i.e "${max-discount-percentage} OFF" or "-${max-discount-percentage}"
